text:
[Verse]
Golden rays they paint the sky
Colors burst like fireflies
Whispers of the evening breeze
Sunset dreams bring me to my knees

[Verse 2]
Crickets chirp their mellow tune
Stars await the rising moon
City lights start to gleam
Sunset dreams feel so supreme

[Chorus]
Dancing in the twilight glow
Hearts are high and spirits flow
Lost in colors wide and free
Sunset dreams are calling me

[Verse 3]
Shadows stretch and fade away
Nighttime takes its gentle sway
Echoes of a fading day
Sunset dreams are here to stay

[Verse 4]
Waves that kiss the sandy shore
Moments we can't ignore
Magic in the horizon's seam
Sunset dreams like a perfect theme

[Bridge]
Eyes reflect the fading light
Holding tight till morning's bright
Silent wishes softly stream
Sunset dreams so real they seem
title: Sunset Dreams
